thread.title: Galenfeha, Inc. Announces Delayed Filing of Quarterly Report

author: cnbc.com
title: Galenfeha, Inc. Announces Delayed Filing of Quarterly Report
text:
FORT WORTH, Texas, May 22, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- via OTC PR WIRE -- Galenfeha, Inc. (OTC:GLFH) announced today that it has experienced additional delays in the filing of its Quarterly Report (Form 10-Q) for the quarter ended March 31, 2018.
On May 15, 2018, Galenfeha filed a Form 12b-25, Notification of Late Filing, with the Securities and Exchange Commission requesting an extension to file Form 10-Q. The primary reasons for the continued delay are the implementation of GAAP ASC 606 compliance, of which the company’s management has little experience, and the company’s recent acquisition requires predecessor/successor reporting. Management is working diligently with our auditors to comply with these new regulations and will be filing Form 10-Q as soon as possible.

Such forward-looking statements are based on the beliefs of the Company's management, as well as assumptions made by and information currently available to the Company's management. Among the factors that could cause actual results to differ materially are the following: the effect of business and economic conditions; the impact of competitive products and pricing; capacity and supply constraints or difficulties; product development, commercialization, or technological difficulties; the regulatory and trade environment; the impact of reimbursement rates and coverage; and the risk factors reported from time to time in the Company's SEC reports. The Company undertakes no obligation to revise any forward-looking statements as a result of future events or developments.
